H0.text: Who makes or made the model of vehicle the Kangoo. Peugeot

H1.text: Who makes or made the model of vehicle the Kangoo. Citroen

H2.text: Who makes or made the model of vehicle the Kangoo. Fiat

H3.text: Who makes or made the model of vehicle the Kangoo. Renault

A4.text: The Renault Kangoo is a family of vans built by Renault since 1997 across three generations.

A5.text: As part of its Z.E. electric car initiative, Renault has developed the Kangoo Z.E. model that is manufactured at its Maubeuge plant.
